abstract: The president wrote on Twitter that his former national security adviser was fired was fired because “frankly, if I listened to him, we would be in World War Six by now.”
lead_paragraph: President Trump lashed out at his former national security adviser, John R. Bolton, on Wednesday, saying Mr. Bolton “begged” him for a job that would not require Senate confirmation, and was fired because “frankly, if I listened to him, we would be in World War Six by now.”
